channel.title: Comments on: When MySQL EXPLAIN Estimates Go Wrong

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2011/10/13/when-mysql-explain-estimates-go-wrong/#comment-3877">Justin Carmony</a>.
Definitely strange. If I were to build a new MySQL server I'd probably go with latest Percona release as well.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Justin Carmony.

Definitely strange. If I were to build a new MySQL server I’d probably go with latest Percona release as well.

item.title: By: Justin Carmony
item.dc:creator: Justin Carmony
item.description: I always wondered. Sometimes I thought they could be wildly off under certain circumstances. Glad I'm on Percona Server 5.5.
item.content:encoded: I always wondered. Sometimes I thought they could be wildly off under certain circumstances. Glad I’m on Percona Server 5.5.
